page.title: 04A LOWDHAM RESIDENT.
page.content: We interviewed a lady who is 96 years old this year.She has lived in Lowdham since 1915. Her name is Ada and she has lived in the Leys for 26 years.Before that she lived in Prospect Villas. She told us many things about herself and Lowdham. When she got home from school she never went out to play.She was not allowed! The shops in Lowdham were much different,the Co-op used to be a tiny cottage. She was married at Lowdham Church in 1915 and rode through the village in a horse and trap. At the Queen's Coronation they held a parade up and down the village.All the children rode in a horse and cart.
